full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL PHYAG NA RDO RJE SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR CHO GA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI THU SHE YE GUNG KUN DGA' DON LDAN ZHES BYAS PA'I MDA' 'BAS, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BLO GROS PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG BRTZON 'GRUS GNYIS KA 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YANG YANG NAN TAN CHEN PO BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I CHED DU, BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndE TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DAG BSGOS BSTAN PA RGYA MTSO'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN,
